lead_paragraph: At a time when the country faces challenges in its relationship with Scotland and Europe, its leaders have only the narrowest of majorities in Parliament to impose their writ.

headline.main: In British Election, Majority Vote Hides Fissures
headline.print_headline: Majority Vote Hides Fissures in Britain

snippet: At a time when the country faces challenges in its relationship with Scotland and Europe, its leaders have only the narrowest of majorities in Parliament to impose their writ.
